original_text: A day of the Lord is coming, Jerusalem, when your possessions will be plundered and divided up within your very walls.
korean_text: 여호와의 날이 이르리라 그 날에 네 재물이 약탈되어 네 가운데에서 나누이리라

sentences.original_text: A day of the Lord is coming, Jerusalem
when your possessions will be plundered
and divided up within your very walls
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 성벽 안에서 나누어질 것이라
